## Publikacje {.section-title .reveal}

<div id="pub-list" class="pub-list"></div>

<script>
(() => {
  const segments = window.location.pathname.split('/').filter(Boolean);
  const repoPrefix = window.location.hostname.endsWith('github.io') && segments[0] && segments[0] !== 'pl'
    ? '/' + segments[0]
    : (window.location.hostname.endsWith('github.io') && segments[1] === 'pl' ? '/' + segments[0] : '');

  const script = document.createElement('script');
  script.src = repoPrefix + '/assets/publications.js';
  script.defer = true;
  script.onload = () => {
    window.initPublications({
      containerId: 'pub-list',
      bibUrl: repoPrefix + '/assets/publications.bib',
      extraUrl: repoPrefix + '/assets/publications_extra.yml',
      meToken: 'Artur Czeszumski',
      labels: {
        errorText: 'Nie udało się wczytać publikacji. Sprawdź pliki assets/publications.bib i assets/publications_extra.yml.'
      }
    });
  };
  document.body.appendChild(script);
})();
</script>
